project_name: 2024 10CM Asia Tour ＜10CM Closer to You＞ in Macau
venue_name: [ 澳门百老汇 ] - 百老汇舞台
project_info:
票价说明：门票价格：港币HKD / 澳门币MOP 1180/980/880/580/480人民币售价：1180/980/880/580/480，门票已含境外服务费 取票说明：本项目不支持退换，购票成功的客户，请您提前办理好中国-澳门签证，门票将于演出前一周左右发出，请您耐心等待，感谢您的支持与理解。
🎈 2024 10CM Asia Tour <10CM Closer to You> in Macau🎈K-indie音乐代表人物10CM即将登陆澳门！！许多歌迷因其动情的声音和独特的音乐而喜爱他。他希望透过2024 Asia tour <10CM Closer to You> in Macau与歌迷进行更近距离地对话。这次是现场聆听10CM各种热门歌曲和新音乐的绝佳机会！澳门见！
🎈 2024 Asia tour <10CM Closer to You> in Macau🎈🗓️｜Date：15th Sep 2024 (Sun)🕗｜Time : 6PM 📍｜Venue ：Broadway Theatre, Broadway Macau™🎫｜Ticket Price：MOP/HKD $1180 (VVIP), $980 (VIP 1), $880 (VIP 2), $580 (CAT 1), $480 (CAT 2)🪧｜Organizer：D-SHOW / Official Hallyu Entertainment🏷️｜Management：Magic Strawberry Sound🎟️｜Ticket Open: 12th Aug 2024 (Mon) 12:00noon 
The fan benefit details will be announced later.- The organizer reserved the right to change these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice.#10CM #권정열 #십센치#2024_10CM_AsiaTour_Macau #ClosertoYou#10CMLiveinMacaua #KdramaOST#Broadway_Theatre #DSHOWHK
